Job Description: Job description                                    As part of our BW / HANACore Development Team you will have the technical responsibility for design,development and optimization of complex data models and planning applicationsbased on BW4HANA in the business area of SiemensMobility global commercial project planning.      Design and Development of technical solutions in order to implement future requirements in line with the business strategy.   You have the full responsibility for design and development of individual Business Intelligence applications/reports based on BW4HANA   We count on your expertise while creating and maintaining complex data models and interfaces in challenging projects.   You understand the requirements from our worldwide business stakeholders and create innovative solutions upon central SAP modules such as FI, CO, PS   In-depth knowledge of HANA and BW backend platform and new technologies   Design, code, test, debug, document and support all types of data flows, views, web services and transformation procedures consistent with established specifications and business requirements to deliver maximum business value   You provide operative support of the application by handling incidents and monitoring data loading processes     What do I bring with me:     The cornerstone of your professional success is a degree in IT, informatics or business informatics. Alternatively, you can show a comparable training in conjunction with corresponding additional qualifications.   Interact with business stakeholders in requirement gathering, understanding business logic and creating end to end data models by building reports using reporting tools to help business making decisions swiftly.   4-8 years of work experience in areas like SAP BW, ABAP, Web Services, reporting tools like SAP Lumira Designer, SAP Analysis for Office.   Strong experience in developing end to end SAP BW4HANA data models.   You are also experienced in daily monitoring of an enterprise data warehouse (Info providers, DSO, process chains, jobs, etc.)   Well Versed in creation of BEx queries built on BW data models and aligning with business in creating reports using reporting tools.   Experience in Enhancing existing reports or build new reports using state of the art BI front end technologies like SAP Analysis for Office and Lumira Designer.   Open to explore and work on new technologies like SAP Analytics Cloud. About Company: Siemens is a technology company focused on industry, infrastructure, transport, and healthcare. From more resource-efficient factories, resilient supply chains, and smarter buildings and grids, to cleaner and more comfortable transportation as well as advanced healthcare, the company creates technology with purpose adding real value for customers. By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.

By combining the real and the digital worlds, Siemens empowers its customers to transform their industries and markets, helping them to transform the everyday for billions of people. Siemens also owns a majority stake in the publicly listed company Siemens Healthineers, a globally leading medical technology provider shaping the future of healthcare. In addition, Siemens holds a minority stake in Siemens Energy, a global leader in the transmission and generation of electrical power.

About Company: Connecting creative, content and commerce, BORN Group is an award winning, global agency that helps brands with digital transformation. BORN, a Tech Mahindra company, produces unique brand experiences by connecting ten specialisms that serve as the foundation of the digital economy: creative design, content production, commerce enablement, conversions (visitors to customers), cloud technology, cognition (analytics), cohesion (integrating all the systems), consulting and completeness (connecting brand experiences) across all channels. Passionate about the work they do, BORN has built a reputation on the high quality of their thinking, planning, delivery and client satisfaction. With offices in New York, Chicago, New Jersey, Toronto, London, Tokyo, Bangalore, Pune and Chennai, its global clients, past and present, include: HanesBrands, Safety-Kleen, Merle Norman, Mondelez, DKNY, RedBull, TAG Heuer, Nestle, Yamaha, Makino, Lorna Jane, Razer, Unilever, Ferragamo, Alex & Ani, Jay Strongwater, DVF, Sothebys, Textron, Maxim Semiconductor, Lennos, Big Bus Tours, Skullcandy, M&S, Salvatore Ferragamo, Fossil Group, and LVMH amongst others.
